TEST_NAME: Nav Bar Entry Authorization Matches Destination
QUERY_CLOB:
select case when coalesce(spu.element_authorization, 'N/A') =  coalesce (aap.authorization_scheme, 'N/A')
            then 'Y'
            else 'N'
            end pass_yn,
       spu.application_id, 
       spu.page_id, 
       spu.created_by,
       spu.created_on,
       spu.last_updated_by,
       spu.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('The authorization scheme (%3) on the Nav Bar Entry `%0` (app %2) does not match the destination (page %4, authorization `%5`)',
                          p0 => spu.element_label,
                          p1 => spu.page_id,
                          p2 => spu.application_id,
                          p3 => coalesce(spu.element_authorization,'null'),
                          p4 => spu.destination_page_id,
                          p5 => coalesce(aap.authorization_scheme,'null'),
                          p6 => spu.parent_element_name
                          ) validation_failure_message,
        apex_string.format('The authorization scheme on the Nav Bar Entry `%0` (app %2) does not match the destination',
                          p0 => spu.element_label,
                          p1 => spu.page_id,
                          p2 => spu.application_id,
                          p6 => spu.parent_element_name
                          ) issue_title,
       null child_code,
       spu.page_authorization, 
       spu.url_type, 
       spu.element_label, 
       spu.element_name, 
       spu.parent_element_name, 
       spu.destination_app_id, 
       spu.destination_page_id, 
       aap.authorization_scheme dest_author_schema, 
       spu.element_authorization,
			 spu.element_id component_id,
			 spu.parent_element_id parent_component_id,
			 aap.workspace
 from V_MV_SVT spu
 inner join apex_application_pages aap on spu.destination_app_id = aap.application_id
                                       and spu.destination_page_id = aap.page_id
 where url_type = 'NAV_BAR_URL'
EXPLANATION: The Authorization scheme of a navigation bar entry should match that of its destination : The authorization scheme of a Nav Bar Entry should match that of its destination
FIX: Add the requisite authorization scheme to the Nav Bar Entry
